page.name: Module 2 Introduction
page.content:
Welcome to Module 2: How Do You Approach Integrating Technology? In the previous module, you learned about why technology is important for instruction and learning. We now understand that technology can improve instruction and deepen student learning. What now? In order to effectively integrate technology in the classroom, teachers must spend time thoughtfully planning for and reflecting on their instruction. In this module, you will identify considerations when planning for instruction, explore an approach to planning for instruction, and apply guidelines to planning for instruction.

After completing Module 2, you will be able to:

  • Define the POST Method
  • Apply the POST Method to integrate technology into a lesson
  • Create a Technology Integration Action Plan for a lesson

Please allow approximately 60 minutes to complete this module.
